actions.recommendation: If you cannot determine a Reynolds Risk score as no hsCRP result, it may be advisable to do an abdominal ultrasound.
To reduce your risk of chronic disease it is advised to maintain your BMI < 25 and your waist to height ratio < 50% (i.e. it is advised that you lose weight, especially around your abdomen).
Please start the glucophage and work on the lifestyle factors discussed.
If you are experiencing symptoms of depression, it is recommended to seek help from a mental health professional.
If you are experiencing symptoms of anxiety, it is recommended to seek help from a mental health professional.
It may be advisable to refer you to a mental health professional for further evaluation and treatment.
You have booked a follow up in December where we will review results and meds.
